nodes.description: 德国当局紧急调查Abedi在德期间是否接触他人
nodes.support_text: German authorities are urgently checking whether Abedi met with anyone in Germany, the usually well informed Focus magazine quoted unnamed “security sources” as saying.

nodes.description: 北威州警方确认Abedi未离开杜塞尔多夫机场 transit 区域
nodes.support_text: Police in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia told the BBC he is not believed to have leaved the airport transit area.

nodes.description: 焦点杂志引用了未具名的安全消息来源的话
